modName: BASE- Balanced Alchemy Smithing and Enchanting
summary: The ultimate modification patch to balance the crafting diversions.
descriptionHtml:
The ultimate modification patch to balance the crafting diversions.

What does this mod do?
1. Fortify Smithing and Alchemy armor enchants and potions removed from game. (its for the best)
2. Nerfs crafting perks in a simplistic way that makes crafting use less perk points (altogether 8 perk points saved from simplifying crafting perks)
3. Elegantly re-worded the nerfed perks.

What this mod does NOT do.
No scripts. No new and confusing perks that you have to learn, just nerfed crafting perks in the same vanilla slots.

Aren't there other mods like this?
Yes. But they are too ambitious and require new things to be learnt. I favor simplistic mods that get the job done.

Why did I make this mod?
So many reasons, I have a type of video game obsessive disorder that forces me to always have the best gear possible. In this case it is crafting a 800 damage Stalhrim bow with 300 damage chaos/frosteed enchants (legit). With this mod, unique equipment and loot has a chance to outclass, which is exciting to me because I've always used player made items because I knew it was superior, don' t worry crafting is still needed because you can improve most unique weapons too! Because this also nerfs the archer and warrior (needed), the mage also is more viable. It also makes crafting more enjoyable as you don't have to swap your armor to your "Alchemy Clothes Set" which was a hassle. It also makes Mage armor such as ebony flesh more viable because it is now more of a fun struggle to get armor capped. I am excited to play my game with this patch and I hope you are to.

1.0 Creation Patch Notes
ALCHEMY
Fortify alchemy can no longer be found on armors. (its for the best)
Alchemist, physician, poisoner & benefactor have been reduced to from 25% to 10%. Alchemist (first alchemy perk) only has one rank now.

SMITHING
Smithing perks reduced to 10% improvement (previously double improvement). Smithing perks wording changed to be more clear.
Fortified smithing can no longer be found on armor and potions. (its for the best)

ENCHANTING
Perks reduced from 25% to 10%. Enchanter (first enchanting perk) only has one rank now.
